content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 35, "index": 13}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 15, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 40, "index": 36}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 20, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft an anvil, I need to place 3 iron_block in a row, followed by an iron_ingot in the middle of the next row, and finally 3 more iron_ingot in the bottom row. Therefore I will first move the iron_block from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 35, "index": 13}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 15, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 40, "index": 36}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 20, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]

Ok
